recipesJson.name: Waterlemone
recipesJson.author: Sublimeice
recipesJson.description:
inspired by wayne's recipe here ---> https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/53215#water_malone_live_mixing_summertime_recipes_by_enyawreklaw

Simply put, just added some lemon flavors to the recipe.

The addition of the lemon flavor, transforms it from a watermelon profile, to a nice slightly tart candied watermelon flavor.
